A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A beautiful movie to look at visually\, but the film has a pessimistic\, cynical\, yet preachy vibe to it that doesn't feel anything like a Star Wars movie.  It's no surprise that sales of Star Wars merchandise (and the popularity of the franchise as a whole) went off a cliff because of this movie.  Last Jedi will be seen as the black sheep\, the ne'er-do-well\, the pariah\, of the Star Wars franchise.
